title: Houston, we have a problem.
body: So, first off, I love this new client. It's so pretty. But when I close and try to reopen it, it says that there's another instance. I'm on Mac, blah blah blah PC superiority. Ya I know. Can someone help me out here? Also can we get lots of upvotes so a rioter can see this and fix it asap. Thanks mates!

replies.body:
How long do you wait between closing the client and trying to launch it again? Sometimes it can take a minute or two for all processes to end, so you may want to give it some time. If waiting doesn't work for you, you may want to end the processes manually using the Activity Monitor. [Here's a guide](http://osxdaily.com/2012/03/02/force-quit-mac-apps/) that can assist you in doing so.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
Well, I don't know what happened but everything seems to be fixed. Before it just wasn't relaunching. like hours of waiting. it was weird. but thank you so much for all of the work you guys do!
